amendment.description: To limit the liability of the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation with respect to a plan for which a reduced deficit contribution is elected.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2234 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 25. Record Vote Number: 4.

Amendment SA 2234 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 2233. (consideration: CR S166-168; text: CR S166) To limit the liability of the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation with respect to a plan for which a reduced deficit contribution is elected.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2234 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 25. Record Vote Number: 4.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2234 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 2233.
